thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Credit checker Experian full-year revenue rises

title: Credit checker Experian full-year revenue rises
text:
May 17, 2018 / 6:37 AM / Updated 15 minutes ago Credit checker Experian full-year revenue rises Reuters Experian Plc, the worldâ€™s biggest credit data company, posted a 7.5 revenue on Thursday, and said it expected 2018 to be another year of growth.
The FTSE-100 company, best known for running consumer credit checks for banks, landlords and retailers, said revenue 31 rose to $4.66 billion from $4.34 billion a year ago.
Pretax profit from ongoing activities for the year rose 7.3 percent to $1.21 billion, the company said. (Reporting By Justin George Varghese in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier)
